rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each digit assigned to 'C' is in a corner cell of the 3x3 outlined box pointed by its arrow. Each digit assigned to 'E' is in an edge cell of the 3x3 outlined box pointed by its arrow.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each digit assigned to 'C' is in a corner cell of the 3x3 outlined box pointed by its arrow. Each digit assigned to 'E' is in an edge cell of the 3x3 outlined box pointed by its arrow.
